item.title:
In 1956, MANIAC I became the first computer to defeat a human being in a chess-like game.
They played "Los Alamos chess", a chess variant played on a 6×6 board without bishops, as to accommodate the machine's limited memory. https://t.co/KmDVqBRk2t
